nodes.description: 2019年9月2日，喀布尔国际组织住宅区遭拖拉机炸弹袭击，致16人死亡119人受伤，包括5名尼泊尔人、2名英国人和1名罗马尼亚外交官
nodes.support_text: On the evening of 2 September 2019, a bomb on a tractor killed 16 people and injured 119 others at a housing compound used by international organisations in Kabul, Afghanistan.

nodes.description: 2019年9月5日，喀布尔市中心安全区域发生自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，造成至少12人死亡（含1名美国军人、1名罗马尼亚士兵）及40余人受伤
nodes.support_text: On 5 September 2019, at least 12 people, including an American service member and a Romanian soldier, were killed and more than 40 injured when a suicide car bomber exploded in a heavily fortified area of central Kabul...

nodes.description: 2019年9月2日，喀布尔国际组织住宅区袭击中25名其他外国居民受伤
nodes.support_text: 25名其他外国居民在袭击中受伤

edges.support_text: On the evening of 2 September 2019... On 5 September 2019...
